mapper.insert: insert into sf_study ( study_no, study_title, study_content, loc_no, field_no, study_level, study_headCount, study_inputdate, study_hit, auth_userid, due_time, penalty_min, penalty_money, limit_time ) values ( sf_study_seq.nextval, #{study_title}, #{study_content}, #{loc_no}, #{field_no}, #{study_level}, #{study_headCount}, sysdate, 0, #{auth_userid}, #{due_time}, #{penalty_min}, #{penalty_money}, #{limit_time} )
mapper.select: select * from sf_study order by study_no desc

select * from sf_study where
loc_no field_no study_title study_content
like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' order by study_no desc
select * from sf_study where auth_userid = #{userid} order by study_no desc

select s.STUDY_NO, s.Auth_USERID, s.STUDY_TITLE, s.STUDY_CONTENT, s.FIELD_NO, s.LOC_NO, s.STUDY_LEVEL, s.STUDY_HEADCOUNT, s.STUDY_INPUTDATE, s.study_hit, s.DUE_TIME, s.PENALTY_MIN, s.PENALTY_MONEY, s.LIMIT_TIME, s.PENALTY_TOTAL from sf_study s, sf_studymember sm where s.study_no = sm.study_no and sm.part_userid = #{part_userid}
